meanings.definition: A unit of digital information storage equal to 1,073,741,824 bytes.
meanings.sent1: My new computer has a hard drive with hundreds of gigabytes of storage.
meanings.sent2: I need more gigabytes to download all these movies.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a thousand gigabytes of cloud storage; now I can save everything!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a gigabyte, storing every detail of our adventures together.
meanings.sent5: The gigabytes of music on his phone kept him entertained for hours.

meanings.definition: The amount of data that can be stored in a gigabyte.
meanings.sent1: The video game required several gigabytes of space on the computer.
meanings.sent2: I have used up all the gigabytes on my data plan for this month.
meanings.sent3: He claimed he could eat a gigabyte of cookies in one sitting!
meanings.sent4: Her smile held a gigabyte of joy, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The gigabytes of information in the textbook were overwhelming at first glance.
